idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Sparse kick placements to mimic the intro groove
playNote([0], beats =0.5)
playNote([0], beats =0.5)
playNote([0], beats =0.5)


playNote(10, beats = 0.25)
rest(3.50)
playNote(10, beats = 1.75)
rest(2.00)
playNote(10, beats = 1.75)
rest(1.75)
playNote(10, beats = 1.75)
rest(2.25)
playNote(10, beats = 1.75)
rest(2.25)
playNote(10, beats = 1.70)
rest(2.25)
playNote(10, beats = 1.75)
